INTERLINK™ — Distributed Cognitive AI Fabric

Architecture Enterprise Government Investors

Overview Section

What is INTERLINK™?

Distributed Cognitive AI Fabric

INTERLINK™ is a Distributed Cognitive AI Fabric designed for enterprises that require autonomy, privacy, and high-performance intelligence without dependence on external clouds. It represents a fundamental architectural shift in how organizations deploy, control, and benefit from artificial intelligence.

Unlike traditional AI solutions that rely on centralized cloud services, INTERLINK™ operates entirely within your infrastructure, providing complete sovereignty over data, processes, and intellectual property while delivering enterprise-grade multimodal intelligence capabilities.

  • Local-first deployment with zero mandatory cloud dependency
  • Multimodal ingest and contextual reasoning capabilities
  • Distributed node communication via Gibberlink™ encrypted protocol
  • Enterprise-grade security with Zero-Fault architecture
  • Compliance-ready for regulated industries (FIN/GOV/HEALTH)

Mission & Purpose Section

Our Mission & Purpose

Redefining enterprise AI infrastructure for the sovereign era

"To empower organizations with sovereign AI infrastructure that protects data privacy and sovereignty, enables regulatory compliance, reduces external dependencies, and accelerates intelligent automation — all under complete enterprise control."

Enterprise Sovereignty

Eliminate vendor lock-in and cloud dependency while maintaining complete control over AI infrastructure, data, and intellectual property. Deploy in air-gapped environments with zero external requirements.

Regulatory Compliance

Built for regulated industries with inherent compliance frameworks for financial services, government, healthcare, and defense sectors. Maintain audit trails and enforce data sovereignty boundaries by design.

Distributed Intelligence

Enable true distributed cognition across organizational boundaries while maintaining security and control. Scale intelligence capabilities across departments, locations, and partner ecosystems.

Product Description Section

Product Overview

Complete cognitive fabric for enterprise intelligence

Multimodal Ingest Engine

Native processing pipeline for PDFs, URLs, websites, YouTube audio/video, raw text, and local files. All content becomes part of the contextual memory for reasoning and agent execution.

Contextual Memory System

Vector-based memory engine with persistent storage, multi-source embeddings, retrieval-based reasoning, and configurable memory profiles for enterprise knowledge management.

Cognitive Reasoning Fabric

Modular reasoning layer containing Loader (intent construction), Router (module dispatch engine), Memory interface, Multimodal reasoning, and distributed execution capabilities.

Gibberlink™ Protocol

Encrypted, low-latency UDP-based distributed communication protocol enabling local-to-local and node-to-node distributed fabrics with zero mandatory cloud dependency.

Interlink Fabric Explanation Section

The INTERLINK Fabric Architecture

Unified cognitive infrastructure for distributed intelligence

System Architecture Layers

Layer 1 — Interfaces

Web Control Panel (React/Vite), CLI Toolkit, REST API, WebSocket Stream, External Integrations

Layer 2 — Backend Gateway (FastAPI)

Request Router, Authentication, API Endpoint Layer, WebSocket Handler

Layer 3 — Cognitive Fabric Core

Loader, Router Engine, Memory Engine, Ingest Engine, Filesystem Fabric, Multimodal Engine, Gibberlink™

Layer 4 — Modules Layer

Ingest Module, Memory Module, Filesystem Module, Multimodal Module, Gibberlink Transport Module

Layer 5 — Data & Storage

Vector memory store, Ingest cache, Temporary processing files, Logs, Configuration profiles

Architecture Summary Section

Technical Architecture

Enterprise-grade foundation for cognitive operations

Core Components

Backend Foundation FastAPI, Modular subsystems, Asynchronous task engine, WebSocket streaming

Frontend Interface React, Vite, Modular UI components, Real-time messaging

CLI Orchestration chat, ingest, raw commands, Utilities for automation and scripting

Security Framework Zero-Fault Protocol, Sanitized ingest, Filesystem restrictions, SHA-384 hashing

Key Modules & Capabilities

Comprehensive cognitive fabric components

  • Ingest Module Unified pipeline for PDFs, websites, YouTube, raw text, and enterprise documents with automatic sanitization and processing.
  • Memory Module Contextual vector memory with persistent storage, retrieval optimization, and semantic search capabilities.
  • Filesystem Module Zero-Fault security with policy-restricted virtual filesystem, sensitive file blocking, and import integrity validation.
  • Multimodal Module Advanced reasoning across text, audio, video, and document content with contextual understanding and analysis.
  • Gibberlink Transport Encrypted distributed communication protocol for node-to-node coordination and decentralized intelligence.
  • Router Engine Intelligent module dispatch and intent routing with load balancing and optimization across distributed nodes.
